name: command-centre

scripts.clean:win: if exist .next rmdir /s /q .next && if exist out rmdir /s /q out && if exist dist rmdir /s /q dist
scripts.clean:all: npm run clean:win && npm run clean:deps
scripts.clean:deps: if exist node_modules rmdir /s /q node_modules && npm install
scripts.firebase:deploy: npm run firebase:build && firebase deploy --only hosting
scripts.health: npm run lint && npm run type-check && npm run test
scripts.reset: npm run clean:all && npm run health
scripts.prepare:firebase: npm run health && npm run firebase:build
scripts.prepare:vercel: npm run health && npm run build
scripts.quick:firebase: npm run clean:win && npm run firebase:deploy
scripts.quick:vercel: npm run clean:win && npm run vercel:deploy
scripts.firebase:build:out: npm run build:static-only && echo Build complete! Files are in the out/ directory
scripts.firebase:serve:out: npm run firebase:build:out && npx serve out -p 3000
scripts.firebase:check:out: if exist out (echo ✅ out directory exists && dir out /b) else (echo ❌ out directory not found)
scripts.firebase:clean:deploy: npm run clean:win && npm run firebase:build:out && firebase deploy --only hosting
scripts.out:verify: npm run firebase:check:out && if exist out\index.html (echo ✅ index.html found in out/) else (echo ❌ index.html missing in out/)
scripts.firebase:info: echo ⚠️ Firebase hosting only supports static sites. Server Actions and API routes will not work. && echo ✅ For full features, use: npm run vercel:deploy
scripts.firebase:force:build: echo ⚠️ Attempting static build - Server Actions will be disabled && cross-env NODE_ENV=production next build && next export -o out
scripts.firebase:simple: echo Building simple static version... && npm run clean:win && npm run firebase:force:build && echo Static build complete in out/ directory

description: Personal Command Centre for daily life.
